title: Introduction to Python
description: Comprehensive introduction to Python programming. Covers syntax, data types, functions, loops, conditionals, and object-oriented programming.

title: Web Development with JavaScript
description: Fundamentals of web development using JavaScript. Create, manipulate HTML/CSS, handle events, and use libraries/frameworks.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Fundamental data structures and algorithms in computer science. Choose structures, implement algorithms, and analyze them.

title: Machine Learning with Python
description: Basic machine learning with Python. Explore linear regression, logistic regression, decision trees, and support vector machines.

title: Android App Development with Java
description: Fundamentals of Android app development using Java. Create and design Android apps using the Android SDK and Android Studio.

title: iOS App Development with Swift
description: Fundamentals of iOS app development with Swift. Create and design iOS apps using the Xcode IDE.

title: Game Development with Unity
description: Basic game development with Unity. Create 2D and 3D games and use the Unity Editor.

title: Database Design and SQL
description: Fundamentals of database design and SQL. Learn about database types, schema design, and SQL query writing.

title: Version Control with Git
description: Introduction to version control using Git. Understand Git basics and how to manage versioned projects.
